title: Part 0: AWS - Overview
intro: What is AWS? What are its provided services? How is it organized?

comments.content: how to create a billing alarm? (example question)
Could you say in a couple of sentences, what is the function of AWS? I am a novice to this software.

replies.content: Hi Jetin, AWS is a public cloud provider. It's not a software. A public cloud consists of different data & computing services available over the Internet to everyone who want to use or purchase them. A service here means a composition of different hardwares with preinstalled softwares that serves a purpose. Hope this helps!
